ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 638
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That book blends in, I had a devil of a time finding it the first time. It s so close to the wall you don t see it at first.
ygData.messageBody:
> ________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 2
> Date: Sat, 23 Nov 2002 17:43:49 -0500
> From: "Wulfric Rennison" <wulftech@...>
> Subject: Re: PoP
>
> Facing the gate in North Qeynos it's on the right hand side. It's standing out in the open and not hidden by anything. It should be easy to find. If you don't see it then you may not have PoP loaded properly.
>
> Wulfric
>
>
>
>
>


That book blends in, I had a devil of a time finding it the first time.
It's so close to the wall you don't see it at first.
